channel.title: HPL 2
channel.description: a general discussion of your experience with it. (It's level editor, if you don't know. It's actually the one that was used to make Amnesia The Dark Descent.)

item.title: HPL 2
item.dc:creator: kewl
item.description:
sersoft:

I’ve used Hammer and MaxEd (max payne level editor) but I can’t say I’ve used this editor. The game levels look nice though, is it easier to use than Hammer? Because hammer is definitely easier than MaxEd.

I’d say it is. I found hammer a little frustrating for myself.

Read full topic
